entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is a student in the class learning Patronus Charm. She is described as watching her Patronus soar around the Room of Requirement.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student in the class learning Patronus Charm. He is described as patiently explaining to Cho that Patronuses are not supposed to be pretty but rather protective.

entities.name: lavender
entities.description: Lavender is a student in the class learning Patronus Charm. She is described as shooting puffs of silver vapor out of her wand and expressing fear at the idea of conjuring a Patronus while facing a boggart.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is a student in the class learning Patronus Charm. He is described as having trouble conjuring his Patronus and being reminded by Harry to think of something happy.

relationships.description: Harry is teaching Cho how to conjure a Patronus. He patiently explains the concept and reminds her that Patronuses are not supposed to be pretty but rather protective.
Harry is helping Neville with his Patronus Conjuring. Harry reminds Neville to think of something happy while conjuring his Patronus.
